title: Ticket #1976: Send email if job notification is set to Error and job goes on hold
description:
Right now if upon submit notification=error, Condor only emails if the job exits with a signal. It would be nice if email was also sent if the job is placed on Hold and the ATTR_HOLD_REASON_CODE is not equal to CONDOR_HOLD_CODE_UserRequest (aka, don't send email if the user placed the job on hold via condor_hold).

Note this work would be easier to do consistently across all universes if #1975 is resolved first.
